articles.title: Analysis: Trump doesn't seem to want to do his job anymore
articles.description: President Donald Trump lost the presidential election 10 days ago. Since then, he's done next to nothing -- at least publicly -- to suggest he plans to continue doing the job in any serious manner through January 20.

THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!
